title: Nemuel
html: NEMUEL(Nemʹu·el).1. First listed of Simeon’s five sons and family head of the Nemuelites. (Nu 26:12-14; 1Ch 4:24) In the list of those who came into Egypt with Jacob he is called Jemuel.—Ge 46:8, 10; Ex 6:15.2. Son of Eliab and great-grandson of Reuben. His brothers were the rebels Dathan and Abiram, whom the earth swallowed up.—Nu 26:5, 8, 9; De 11:6.
